These set of unprofitted fraudsters lives t set confusions in the surroundings whereas the both categories of who had made it and who haven't made it can't be decided accorded to their way of doings in the public.I sometimes admires them but fraudulent is not a thing of me but since I know about the potential enrichment of Bitcoin, I decided to adopt and accept being one of the investors too which I approach one of a friend who is a profitable Bitcoin investor to help and guide me through which he gave me some sorts of basic knowledges but I want to talk about the part he say that "he doesn't want to be publicly known as a Bitcoin dealer that if not of me he would play adamant like he knows nothing about Bitcoin".He insighted to me that Bitcoin is not an illegal innovated technology, but due to its highest level of global recognition with its potential of enrichment and to stand against the bad time of global falling economy, the public would always have the Bitcoin dealers in both trading and Investing as a cool good rich dude and such in an unsecured societies is believed to being exposed to insecurities within the residence. So it is always better off to stay anonymous while standing firm on your Bitcoin journey.Just in few days ago, I was on a bar with a friend where I saw a Forex Trader loudly talking about how he usually makes over $1,400 in an hour and could make over $4,000 profits on daily basis. He was saying this like he was bragging about it and I admired him just like informally admired those Yahoo guys. In no time, some guys behind brought out a phone and made their mathematical calculation and said within themselves that " wow this guy must be a millionaire and looking so exposed and simple like this, he is just lucky we are not one of those bad guys else we would have him kidnaped and demand a ransom of #30,000,000"It was then I thought about what that of my Bitcoineers friend told be able the risk of being exposed with ones identify of a Bitcoin investor.I have accepted the situation to be an experience to keep your business secretive if possible and keep your net worth a private or if must be discussed, must be an indoor and must be just with that of some business partners else ones is enclaved with an envelope of dangers.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: My brother, luxurious life dey sweet oo, to show off dey sweet well well, but e still fit put you at great risk, because as you dey live your life they go, people go just dey corner dey observe you, and dem fit get bad intentions against you and before you go know dem don kidnap you as hostage for ransom. So much even you dey admire the lifestyle of some yahoo boys make you nor forget the risk wey still dey associated with their luxurious life. Especially now wey EFCC dey very active to find fraudster, life wey you wan enjoy go come dey hunt you down, if there is anything I have learnt, one of them is to contented with what I have and no try to impress anybody. E get one talk wey say, "don't try to impress anybody, if only you know the rate at which the dead are forgotten" the best life wey any crypto enthusiastic fit leave naim be to dey on a coded low-key life.

People get excited and talk out loud without knowing they are in private place, and that can bring enermy around them. I noticed this each time someone is making a financial call, people will be concentrated to know about what you are saying on phone. Sometimes after making call they will stay hailing you like "odogwu! na man you be" so  I have device a means of communicating my friends in public when it comes to financial discussions. I think with this we can avoid speaking out loud in public places because we are always a victim of that.

comments.body: The simple truth be say that guy wey dey brag of having such profit in his forex business is not saying the fact. Maybe the person still dey learn with all those account wey no be real money and him dey see the kind money wey him no fit withdraw self. I know say people wey get money no dey always brag but if you don dey brag like that, you have to look the person two times. I no suppose say person go dey put him private life outside because dat dey dangerous as people fit plan the person and rub am or harm am.As always everything about bitcoin dey decentralised and anonymous, na if you want make person sabi about wetin you get the person go sabi but if you no want anybody to know, dem no fit small ground to know about am.
